Class Loader

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component

                  weka.gui.beans.AbstractDataSource
                      weka.gui.beans.Loader
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.beans.beancontext.BeanContextChild, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, EnvironmentHandler, BeanCommon, DataSource, EventConstraints, Startable, Visible, WekaWrapper
public class Loader
extends AbstractDataSource
implements Startable, WekaWrapper, EventConstraints, BeanCommon, EnvironmentHandler

Loads data sets using weka.core.converter classes

1.0

getStartMessage

public java.lang.String getStartMessage()
Gets a string that describes the start action. The KnowledgeFlow uses this in the popup contextual menu for the component. The string can be proceeded by a '$' character to indicate that the component can't be started at present.

Specified by:
getStartMessage in interface Startable
Returns:
a string describing the start action.
